reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be a quality piece of clothing that looks and feels great, with a thick yet soft fabric and perfect weight for fall.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater jacket
items.body: This sweater coat is nicely fitting and warm. Thick enough to provide me some wind protection. Fits well. Pockets are well placed. After washing the knit did snug up slightly but overall the garment fits well and looks nice too. I am not a small person and the size L fits me fine. I don’t feel like I should have bought the XL. As noted in the description, the buttons are non functional. There is enough of the weather though that can wrap across a little bit to stay warmer and the knit holds its shape after letting it go. Read more
items.author: TorKlhoush

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Style & Material
items.body: I’m a picky person so number one Love this sweater cost perfect weight, material, and style. Very warm and cozy, knee length on me 5ft 4in 160lbs I bought size Lg, fits well enough but want bit larger in case I wear a sweater underneath. Good quality good price. Read more
items.author: Diane H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO cute! Beautiful rich color.
items.body: Bought this is in the green, size Medium. I usually wear an 8-10, wear a 36B, and 5'5", 165lbs. It fits PERFECTLY, It hangs beautifully and is not super heavy, but not cheap and light either. Very nice, and would buy another color or two. SO cute casually with jeans, or over a shorter dress or skirt, boots, etc...Size is accurate, and not 'frumpy'. Read more
items.author: karen kocurek

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but size guide is not accurate
items.body: The sweater is nice, warm and looks great, however the sizing is a bit off. Everything I've gotten in large recently has been too big so i opted for medium because that was the measurements i needed to have it fit comfortably with a little extra room for comfort and it definitely is not roomy. I can barely close it over itself in front. Minor price to pay for a nice cardigan that will work for what I need but I definitely should have gotten a large. Read more
items.author: Summer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Iron, steam will be necessary
items.body: Great look, sweater has a nice knit/texture Will have to iron or steam the collar/lapel Read more
items.author: sue bartlett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Fall when a coat is too much
items.body: I really like these sweaters!! A good heavy weight, tight weave, nice and warm. “Lapel” lays flat and the buttons give a stylish flare. Garment hangs straight and hits me at the knee which I find slimming. I’m 5’4”/140lbs and size M is perfect! I bought 2 colors. The green is a very rich, deep green and the white is more like a black and white marled, giving a gray heathered effect. Very versatile. Read more
items.author: Kathy N.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: Fits well, very soft, substantial and quality feel. Read more
items.author: Blugecko

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice .
items.body: I love the material. It’s very soft and good quality. It runs a little big so I wish I had sized down one size. But otherwise I love the style. Read more
items.author: Cathy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Tan, Gray, B Khaki, Hazeblue, Pure Armygreen, Red Brown, C Burgundy, Apricot, Pure White, Red, Navy, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
